attributes.action: Give all prison officers in high security prisons stab proof vests
attributes.background: After the recent attacks on prison officers at Hmp Frankland it is now time for officers to be issued with better protective equipment. I was stabbed in the back  15 yrs ago in Hmp Frankland and no lessons have been learnt. Stab proof vest are now a must or someone is going to lose their life.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725170
